description: Creates a table of volumes of subcortical structures for a given list of subjects using FreeSurfer.

subjects.title: Subject IDs
subjects.description: List of subject IDs. Each subject should be specified with a separate -s flag.

subject_file.title: Subject file
subject_file.description: Path to a file containing a list of subjects.

outfile.title: Output file
outfile.description: Output file where the table will be saved.

idmap.title: ID map
idmap.description: File with structure name and id number. Default is FREESURFER_HOME/tkmeditColorsCMA.

structure_ids.title: Structure IDs
structure_ids.description: Names of structures to include in the table. Defaults to all structures.

subjects_dir.title: Subjects directory
subjects_dir.description: Path to the subjects directory. Default is SUBJECTS_DIR environment variable.
